Fales Library and Special Collections
Alan Sondheim Papers
Sondheim, Alan
MSS.267
55.5 Linear Feet in 52 records cartons, 6 flat boxes, 1 small cassette box, and 1 large reel
95 sound tape reels 94 1/4" audio reels and 1 1/2" audio reel
215 audiocassettes 214 compact cassettes and 1 microcassette
45 film reels 15 8mm films, 4 super8 films, 21 16mm films, 4 35mm films, 1 offsite film
87 videoreels (1/2 inch)
100 videocassettes (u-matic)
7 videocassettes (betamax)
1 videocassettes (betacam)
124 videocassettes (vhs)
3 videocassettes (minidv)
2 sound discs (vinyl)
21 electronic discs (cd-rom)
16 dvd-r disks
2 3.5" floppy disks
1 media elements 1 hard drive
9 items 9 artifacts
1965-2002
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Purchased from Alan Sondheim in April, 2010; the accession number associated with this collection is 2009-267.
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Audiovisual materials have not been preserved and may not be available to researchers. Materials not yet digitized will need to have access copies made before they can be used. To request an access copy, or if you are unsure if an item has been digitized, please contact [Fales, special.collections@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596] with the collection name, collection number, and a description of the item(s) requested. A staff member will respond to you with further information.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Alan Sondheim Papers; MSS 267; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
